name: Johto Region Demo
description:
Based on the second Pokemon generation and the remakes in 2010. Areas covered: \-New Bark Town
\-Routes 29-31
\-Cherrygrove City
\-Routes 45-46
\-Dark Cave Custom models imported from Warcraft 3 and World of Warcraft. Credits go to: \-Blizzard Entertainment
\-"printIn" for Blender m3addon
\-"Jeromnimo" for WoW model viewer and its m3 exporter
\-Thomas Glamsch for Blender MDL importer Users are free to modify this map for adding/customizing game modes, I only request credits for the terrain. No Pokemon models yet...
author: ranchburner
